title: Mind of the Virtuoso
body:
Can we please get some opinions and maybe a review on that video?

It looks fucking awesome and even at only 1:21 looks like it would have had a lot of work go into it, but that part that looks like someone is smoking, this game does have kids playing and possibly shouldn't be advertising with anything like that.

replies.body: Quite possibly the dumbest thread I've seen in a long time.
dude it's only smoke, kids get to experience worst things in game anyways. They see cussing everywhere and stuff.
guys, she's not freaking smoking, it's sona getting shot through the freaking throat and smoke is rising up and out of her mouth...............
If graves can't have a cigar why does she get to smoke!
